content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Ms. Müller. I'm glad you could make it. The apartment is indeed in a prime location, and I'm sure you'll find it quite comfortable. Now, regarding the rental price, I'm open to discussing a fair market value that reflects the quality of the property. What is your budget, and what are you looking for in an apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mr. Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a quiet, comfortable and newly built apartment in the city center. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Ms. Müller. While 450 euros is a reasonable amount, I believe the location and amenities of this apartment justify a slightly higher price. How does 500 euros per month sound to you? This would cover the cost of the utilities and maintenance as well.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate the offer, but as a student, I am on a tight budget. I would like to negotiate the price down to 480 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your budget concerns, Ms. Müller. However, the location and the recent construction of the apartment do justify a higher price. If you are willing to pay 480 euros per month, I would have to reconsider some of the terms of the lease, such as the duration or the possibility of future price adjustments. Would you be open to discussing these aspects?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am willing to sign a two-year lease agreement and pay a deposit of one month's rent. I am also responsible and dependable, so I am confident that I will be a reliable tenant. I believe that 480 euros per month is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your commitment, Ms. Müller. A two-year lease and a deposit are indeed favorable terms for a landlord. However, given the current market and the exceptional location of the apartment, I must insist on 500 euros per month. This would ensure a stable income and provide a better living environment for you. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate your position. However, as a student, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay 485 euros per month, which is a reasonable price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe this is a fair compromise.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ms. Müller, your willingness to negotiate is appreciated. While 485 euros is closer to my asking price, I still believe that 500 euros per month is the most fair and competitive rate for this apartment. This would provide you with a modern, centrally located home that is convenient for a student. Would you be willing to reconsider your budget slightly to match this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your point of view. However, I must respectfully decline to pay 500 euros per month. 485 euros is the highest amount I can pay for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe this is a fair compromise.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Ms. Müller. While I would prefer to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month, I am willing to accept your offer of 485 euros under certain conditions. First, I would like to have the option to increase the rent by a small percentage after the first year of the lease, to account for any potential increases in operating costs. Additionally, I would require a six-month notice of any intent to vacate, rather than the standard three months, to ensure that I have enough time to find a suitable replacement tenant. Would these terms be acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your concerns and I am willing to agree to your terms. I agree to the price of 485 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
